a.n: George Shearing: The South Bank Show

p.k: George Shearing, blind since birth, is one of the world's greatest jazz pianists. Filmed on both sides of the Atlantic, this tribute to Shearing showcases the music which took the jazz world by storm.
p.d: George Shearing, blind since birth, is one of the world's greatest jazz pianists. Filmed on both sides of the Atlantic, this tribute to Shearing showcases the music which took the jazz world by storm. Specially-shot performances and archive clips feature music spanning the six decades of his remarkable career and classics such as 'September in the Rain', 'Lullaby of Birdland', 'Greensleeves', 'Donna Lee' and 'Freedom Jazz Dance' are included, as well as many other recent compositions.
